import React from 'react'; // motion import {motion} from "framer-motion"; // variants import {fadeIn} from "../variants"; // Handler to open email client const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target); const name = formData.get('name'); const email = formData.get('email'); const message = formData.get('message'); const mailtoLink = `mailto:tristanarts@icloud.com?subject=Contact from ${name}&body=Message: ${message}%0D%0AFrom: ${name} (${email})`; window.location.href = mailtoLink; }; const Testimonials = () => { return (
{/* text */}

Testimonials

{/* form */}
); }; export default Testimonials;
